class pymd.MD(system, clist, integ)¶

Bases: _ctypes.Structure

This class with for loading the system and running the simulation

run()¶

Runs MD with number of loops defined in MD.system.n_steps, separated in an outer loop in python with npysteps, and an inner loop run in C with ncsteps, such that system.n_steps = npysteps * ncsteps

runInnerLoop(i)¶
class pymd.System(n_particles=1000, n_steps=1000, timestep=0.0005, saveevery=10)¶

Bases: _ctypes.Structure

Inteface to C structure. Defines atributes of the system under study.

force¶

Structure/Union member

init_velocities(from_C=False)¶

Defines way to initialize velocities. Random for the moment.

Args:
from_C (bool): uses C rand() function with constant seed for initialization, otherwise uses Python’s random module with constant seed
